Welcome!


This is a graphical interface for analysing social graphs. This is a short tutorial on how to use our application.
In the center, you can find your central graph. Nodes and edges represent animals and their social interactions.

The sidebars help you to compare nodes of the graph. By hovering your mouse on a node, you can load information of the node to the left column. By clicking on a node, the information stored in the selected node will be shown in the right column.
You can manipulate the graph with different actions: add nodes, edges, predict connections.
If you need further assistance, please check out our FAQ page.
